Shift Bioscience建立了北美的设施，以扩大AI驱动的虚拟细胞技术的功能Shift Bioscience是一家生物技术公司，使用AI动力的虚拟细胞与年龄相关疾病作斗争，今天宣布建立了一支新的北美团队和设施，以推动该公司发现恢复基因目标的平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/shift-bioscience-bablishes-north-merican-facities-to-to-expand-capabilities of-ai-powered-powered-power-power-virtual-virtual-cell-cell-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/shift-bioscience-1tablishes-north-merican-facilities-to-expand-capabilities of-ai-powered-powered-power-virtual-virtual-cell-cell-cell-cell-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8773F288-8854-4237-4237-98AC-B11331333B4BA Tue, 18 Feb 2025 23:19:00 -0500 Shift Bioscience establishes North American facilities to expand capabilities of AI-powered virtual cell technology

从酱油到钠标签：日本如何重新思考盐分日本减少盐的努力降低了数十年的钠摄入量，但水平保持很高，促使经济建模以评估更严格的政策对心血管疾病和医疗保健成本的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/from-soy-sauce-to-sodium-labels-labels-how-japan-is-restinking-salt-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/from-soy-sauce-to-sodium-labels-labels-how-japan-is-is-rethinking-salt-salt-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2DADD715-D909-4AC3-9502-B0C62DD1A46D Tue, 18 Feb 2025 22:48:00 -0500 From soy sauce to sodium labels: How Japan is rethinking salt reduction
